name: TrendSetter
description:
Trendsetter is a fast-paced, 3D, isometric endless runner were you are a cube trying to run away from the encroaching mainstream. This is meant to show the appropriation between the mainstream and sub cultures and shows how the mainstream attempts to adapt and borrow various features from its surrounding sub cultures until they are completely apart of the mainstream.

Also best played at max resolution and graphical settings.
